SU/CWP format¶

class nessi.io.su_fmt.SUdata¶

Seismic Unix format support

Create a minimal SU file

image(bclip=None, wclip=None, clip=None, legend=0, label1=' ', label2=' ', title=' ')¶

Calculate the dispersion diagram using MASW method

read(filename, endian=' ')¶

Read Seismic Unix file.

Parameters:
  • filename – name of the SU file
  • endian – byte order: little endian (default) ‘l’, big endian ‘b’.
